preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: The goal of Seam for Apache Wicket is to provide a fully integrated CDI programming model to the Apache Wicket web framework. Although Apache components (pages, panels, buttons, etc.) are created by direct construction using "new", and therefore are not themselves CDI contextual instances, with seam-wicket they can receive injections of scoped contextual instances via @Inject. In addition, conversation propagation is supported to allow a conversation scope to be tied to a wicket page and propagated across pages.
